summary: The implementation successfully delivers all five main requirements (REQ-5 through REQ-9) with comprehensive dark theme styling, animated welcome screen, enhanced dashboard with XP mechanics, AI chat integration, and leaderboard. All requested features appear to be implemented based on the diff evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Profile page placeholder with 'Coming Soon' message
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists 'User authentication or profile management' as a non-goal. While Profile tab exists in bottom nav (which is acceptable for maintaining the 4-tab structure), the Profile page component itself was not requested.
